Jump to navigation Jump to search

William
Bishop
Venerated in Roman Catholic Church
Canonized 21 January 1224 by Pope Honorius III
Feast 2 September

William of Roskilde (c.1073 or 1074) was a Danish prelate of the Roman Catholic Church who served as the Bishop of Roskilde in Denmark from about 1060 to 1073 or 1074.

He was canonized as a saint on 21 January 1224 by Pope Honorius III .

His memorial is observed by the Roman Catholic Church on September 2. [1]
